LocalizedStrings.enGB: Select one advanced armor training option.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 选择一项进阶防具训练

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Beginning at 7th level, instead of increasing the benefits provided by armor training (reducing his armor check penalty by 1 and increasing its maximum Dexterity bonus by 1), a fighter can choose an advanced armor training option (see Advanced Armor Training below) . If the fighter does so, he still gains the ability to move at his normal speed while wearing medium armor at 3rd level, and while wearing heavy armor at 7th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 7级起，每当战士本该获取额外一级的防具训练时，他可以转而获得一项进阶防具训练作为替代。注意，即使你在7级时如此做，你也能获得穿甲时不降低移动速度的能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Highly skilled and experienced fighters can gain advanced weapon training, learning techniques and applications of the weapon training class feature that give them special benefits in exchange for specializing in a smaller number of fighter weapon groups.
Beginning at 9th level, instead of selecting an additional fighter weapon group, a fighter can choose an advanced weapon training option for one fighter weapon group that he previously selected with the weapon training class feature.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 9级起，每当你本该可以选择将武器训练应用于一个新的武器类别时，你可以选择一项进阶武器训练作为替代。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 4th rank, Aeon gains an ability to make his weapons and spells especially deadly against his enemies. For a number of rounds per day equal to twice your mythic rank plus your character level, you can make any weapon you wield count as having Bane quality, your spells gain a bonus equal to your mythic rank to caster level checks to overcome spell resistance, and every hit you make with weapons or spells dispel effects from the target, as per the dispel magic spell.
Additionally, if you have inquisitor's bane ability, you gain the same bonuses while using inquisitor's bane ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 4级神话等级时，御衡者获得使他的武器变得特别致命的能力。每日角色等级+2*神话等级轮，你可以使得你装备的任何武器对任何敌人都视作有破敌的效果。此外，在御衡者破敌激活期间，你的法术穿透额外获得等同神话等级的加值，你对所有受到你的物理命中或法术伤害的敌人施放解除魔法，以角色等级作为施法者等级。最后，如果你有审判官的破敌职业能力，在审判官破敌激活期间，你也获得相同的法术穿透和解除魔法能力。
御衡者破敌使用次数提升

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Until the target of the smite is dead

You gain an animal companion as if you were a druid of your character level –3. Unlike normal animals of its kind, an animal companion's Hit Dice, abilities, skills, and feats advance as you advance in level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你获得动物伙伴，如同你是你的人物等级-3的德鲁伊。动物伙伴的等级、能力、专长可以正常随你的人物等级成长。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A flaming burst weapon explodes with flame upon striking a successful critical hit. The fire does not harm the wielder. A flaming burst weapon deals an extra 1d10 points of fire damage on a successful critical hit. Add an extra 1d10 points of fire damage for every critical multiplier beyond 2.

A icy burst weapon explodes with ice upon striking a successful critical hit. The cold does not harm the wielder. An icy burst weapon deals an extra 1d10 points of cold damage on a successful critical hit. Add an extra 1d10 points of cold damage for every critical multiplier beyond 2.

A shocking burst weapon explodes with electricity upon striking a successful critical hit. The electricity does not harm the wielder. A shocking burst weapon deals an extra 1d10 points of electricity damage on a successful critical hit. Add an extra 1d10 points of electricity damage for every critical multiplier beyond 2.
An arcanist with this exploit can acquire a familiar as the arcane bond wizard class feature. A familiar is a magical pet that enhances the wizard's skills and senses
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥能师可以选择获得魔宠以替代一项奥能技艺。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The arcanist can select one item creation feat as a bonus feat. She must meet the prerequisites of this feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥能师可以选择获得一个造物专长以替代一项奥能技艺。他需要满足先决条件。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The arcanist can select one metamagic feat as a bonus feat. She must meet the prerequisites of this feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥能师可以选择获得一个超魔专长以替代一项奥能技艺。他需要满足先决条件。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The arcanist can prepare a spell in place of an existing spell by expending 1 point from her arcane reservoir. Using this ability is a full-round action that provokes an attack of opportunity. The spell prepared must be of the same level as the spell being replaced.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个会触发借机攻击的整轮动作，奥能师可以消耗一点奥能点，将一个已经准备的法术替换为任何他已知的、但没有准备的同等级法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: While wearing armor, the fighter gains a bonus on Intimidate checks based upon the type of armor he is wearing: +1 for light armor, +2 for medium armor, or +3 for heavy armor. This bonus increases by 1 at 7th level and every 4 fighter levels thereafter, to a maximum of +4 at 19th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当战士穿甲时，可以在威吓检定上获得取决于他所穿甲类型的加值：轻甲+1，中甲+2，重甲+3。这个加值在7级以及之后的每4级都会增加1点，但无论何种盔甲都以4点为最高。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: When wearing heavy armor, the fighter gains DR 1/—. At 7th level, the fighter gains DR 1/— when wearing medium armor, and DR 2/— when wearing heavy armor. At 11th level, the fighter gains DR 1/— when wearing light armor, DR 2/— when wearing medium armor, and DR 3/— when wearing heavy armor. The DR from this ability stacks with other DR/-
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当战士穿着重甲时，他获得DR1/—。在7级时，战士在穿着中甲时获得DR 1/—，在穿着重甲时获得DR 2/—。在11级时，战士在穿着轻甲时获得DR 1/—，在穿着中甲时获得DR 2/—，在穿着重甲时获得DR 3/—。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: When wearing heavy armor, the fighter gains DR 1/—. At 7th level, the fighter gains DR 1/— when wearing medium armor, and DR 2/— when wearing heavy armor. At 11th level, the fighter gains DR 1/— when wearing light armor, DR 2/— when wearing medium armor, and DR 3/— when wearing heavy armor. If the fighter is 19th level and has the armor mastery class feature, these DR values increase by 5. The DR from this ability stacks with that provided by adamantine armor, but not with other forms of damage reduction.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当战士穿着重甲时，他获得DR1/—。在7级时，战士在穿着中甲时获得DR 1/—，在穿着重甲时获得DR 2/—。在11级时，战士在穿着轻甲时获得DR 1/—，在穿着中甲时获得DR 2/—，在穿着重甲时获得DR 3/—。这些加值和盔甲大师叠加，但不和其他任何Dr叠加，因为你开启了设置DrRework。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You treat the armor bonus from your armor as 50% higher than normal, to a maximum increase of half your mythic rank plus one.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的盔甲带来的护甲AC提高一半，但不能超过(1+神话等级)/2。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You don’t take an armor check penalty or incur an arcane spell failure chance when wearing heavy armor or using any shield. In addition, the maximum Dexterity bonus of heavy armor doesn’t apply to you.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你完全忽略重甲的最高敏捷调整、鉴定减值和奥术失败率。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: While wearing armor or wielding a shield, you reduce the armor check penalty by 1 per mythic rank and increase the maximum Dexterity bonus allowed by 1 per mythic rank. Additionally you reduce your arcane spell failure chance from armor and sheilds by 5% per mythic rank.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的盔甲最高敏捷调整提高神话等级点，鉴定减值降低神话等级点，奥术失败率降低5%每神话等级。鉴定减值和奥术失败率最低降低为0。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You don’t take an armor check penalty or incur an arcane spell failure chance when wearing light armor or using any shield. In addition, the maximum Dexterity bonus of light armor doesn’t apply to you.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你完全忽略轻甲的最高敏捷调整、鉴定减值和奥术失败率。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You don’t take an armor check penalty or incur an arcane spell failure chance when wearing medium armor or using any shield. In addition, the maximum Dexterity bonus of medium armor doesn’t apply to you.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你完全忽略中甲的最高敏捷调整、鉴定减值和奥术失败率。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The AC bonus granted by any heavy armor you equip increases by 1 for every 4 fighter levels you possess up to a maximum of 5.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你穿的重甲的AC加值提高每四个战士等级一点，最高5点。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The AC bonus granted by any light armor you equip increases by 1 for every 4 fighter levels you possess up to a maximum of 3.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你穿的轻甲的AC加值提高每四个战士等级一点，最高3点。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The AC bonus granted by any medium armor you equip increases by 1 for every 4 fighter levels you possess up to a maximum of 4.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你穿的中甲的AC加值提高每四个战士等级一点，最高4点。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The fighter selects one specific type of armor with which he is proficient, such as light or heavy. While wearing the selected type of armor, the fighter adds one-quarter of his fighter level to the armor’s armor bonus, up to a maximum bonus of +3 for light armor, +4 for medium armor, or +5 for heavy armor. This increase to the armor bonus doesn’t increase the benefit that the fighter gains from feats, class abilities, or other effects that are determined by his armor’s base armor bonus, including other advanced armor training options. A fighter can choose this option multiple times. Each time he chooses it, he applies its benefit to a different type of armor.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 战士选择一种盔甲。当穿着他所选盔甲时，战士在盔甲的护甲加值上加上四分之一他的战士等级，轻甲最多不能超过+3，中甲最多不能超过+4，重甲最多不能超过+5。战士可以多次选择该进阶盔甲训练，每次他选择时，他都能将该选项的效果应用在一个不同的盔甲类型上。
护甲训练-移除盔甲移动速度减值

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Azata shares a bond with her dragon. 50% damage is redirected to Aivu. In addition, Aivu gets additional DR N/Lawful where N is equal to Azata's mythic rank.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 灵使的命运和全格拉利昂最可爱的龙[此条目翻译由爱乌提供]紧密相连。任何时候灵使受到伤害，50%伤害由爱乌代为承受。此外，爱乌获得等同灵使神话等级的Dr/守序。

If the character already has the class skill, weapon proficiency or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding bonuses from background change to a +1 trait bonus in case of skills, a +1 trait bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a -1 Armor Check Penalty reduction in case of armor proficiency.

If the character already has the class skill, weapon proficiency or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding bonuses from background change to a +1 trait bonus in case of skills, a +1 trait bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a -1 Armor Check Penalty reduction in case of armor proficiency.

如果角色已经有该项本职技能、武器或防具擅长，则改为获得1点对应技能上的特性加值，1点对应武器攻击检定上的特性加值，或者对应防具的-1防具检定减值。

瓦里西亚探索者将{g|Encyclopedia:Trickery}巧手{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_World}知识（世界）{/g}加入本职{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}列表。她还会在反射{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}上获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。
如果角色已经有该项本职技能、武器或防具擅长，则改为获得1点对应技能上的特性加值，1点对应武器攻击检定上的特性加值，或者对应防具的-1防具检定减值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Warrior of the Linnorm Kings adds Mobility to the list of her class skills. She also becomes proficient with handaxes, battleaxes and greataxes. In addition Warrior of the Linnorm Kings gains 5 cold resistance.
If the character already has the class skill, weapon proficiency or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding bonuses from background change to a +1 trait bonus in case of skills, a +1 trait bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a -1 Armor Check Penalty reduction in case of armor proficiency.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
蛇龙王之地勇士将{g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}灵巧{/g}加入本职{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}列表。她还会擅长手斧、战斧和巨斧。此外，蛇龙王之地勇士获得5点寒冷抗性。
如果角色已经有该项本职技能、武器或防具擅长，则改为获得1点对应技能上的特性加值，1点对应武器攻击检定上的特性加值，或者对应防具的-1防具检定减值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become proficient with bardiches and can use them as a weapon.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你擅长新月战斧，可以把它们当作武器使用。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A black blade has an arcane pool with a number of points equal to 1 + its Intelligence bonus.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 黑刃有独立于魔战士本人的奥法池点数，为1+黑刃的智力调整值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
The Black Blade starts with the following stats:
Ego: 5
Int: 11
Wis: 7
Cha: 7
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
黑刃的初始属性如下：
觉醒度：5
智力：11
感知：7
魅力：7

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A black blade's enhancement bonus increases as it gains levels. It is +1 at level 3 and increases by 1 every 4 levels thereafter. A black blade cannot be wielded by anyone other than its owner.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 黑刃的增强加值随你的魔战士等级而提高，在3级时为+1，此后每升4级，额外加1。黑刃不能由其他角色持用。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A black blade's enhancement bonus increases as it gains levels. It is +1 at level 3, +2 at level 5, +3 at level 9, +4 at level 13, and +5 at level 17. A black blade cannot be wielded by anyone other than its owner.
Your Black Blade takes the form of a Bastard Sword.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的黑刃呈现出重剑的形态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your Black Blade takes the form of a Battleaxe.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的黑刃呈现出战斧的形态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your Black Blade takes the form of a Dueling Sword.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的黑刃呈现出决斗剑的形态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your Black Blade takes the form of a Dwarven Waraxe.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的黑刃呈现出矮人战斧的形态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Black Blade's ego increases by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的黑刃的觉醒度提升2。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Black Blade's ego increases by 3.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的黑刃的觉醒度提升3。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Black Blade's ego increases by 4.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的黑刃的觉醒度提升4。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 5th level, as a free action, a wielder can spend a point of his black blade’s arcane pool to have it deal one of the following types of damage instead of weapon damage: cold, electricity, or fire. He can spend 2 points from the black blade’s arcane pool to deal sonic or force damage instead of weapon damage. This effect lasts until the start of the wielder’s next turn.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 5级时，黑刃可以消耗1点奥能池点数，直到魔战士的下一轮，黑刃的所有伤害转为某种他选定的元素伤害。也可以消耗2点奥能池点数，并转为造成力场或音波伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 5th level, as a free action, the wielder can spend a point of his black blade’s arcane pool to have it deal one of the following types of damage instead of weapon damage: cold, electricity, or fire. He can spend 2 points from the black blade’s arcane pool to deal sonic or force damage instead of weapon damage. This effect lasts until the start of the wielder’s next turn.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 5级时，黑刃可以消耗1点奥能池点数，直到魔战士的下一轮，黑刃的所有伤害转为某种他选定的元素伤害。也可以消耗2点奥能池点数，并转为造成力场或音波伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Black Blade's damage is converted into cold damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 黑刃的伤害转化为寒冷伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Black Blade's damage is converted into electricity damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 黑刃的伤害转化为电击伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Black Blade's damage is converted into fire damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 黑刃的伤害转化为火焰伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Black Blade's damage is converted into force damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 黑刃的伤害转化为力场伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Black Blade's damage is converted into sonic damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 黑刃的伤害转化为音波伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your Black Blade takes the form of a Falcata.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的黑刃呈现出反曲剑的形态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your Black Blade takes the form of a Handaxe.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的黑刃呈现出手斧的形态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your Black Blade takes the form of a Kama.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的黑刃呈现出单镰的形态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your Black Blade takes the form of a Kukri.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的黑刃呈现出反曲刀的形态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 19th level, each time the wielder kills a living creature with the black blade, he can pick one of the following effects: 
Blade - The Black Blade restores 2 points to its arcane pool.
Shared - The Black Blade restores 1 point to its arcane pool and the magus restores 1 point to his arcane pool
Wielder - The Wielder gains a number of temporary hit points equal to the black blade’s ego (these temporary hit points last until spent or 1 minute, whichever is shorter).
Each time the wielder kills a living creature with the black blade, the black blade restores 2 points of its arcane pool.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每当你使用黑刃杀死一个活物，黑刃的奥法池恢复2点。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Each time the wielder kills a living creature with the black blade, the black blade restores 1 point to its arcane pool and the weilder restores 1 point to his arcane pool.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每当你使用黑刃杀死一个活物，魔战士和黑刃的奥法池各恢复1点。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Each time the wielder kills a living creature with the black blade, the wielder gains a number of temporary hit points equal to the black blade’s ego (these temporary hit points last until spent or 1 minute, whichever is shorter).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每当你使用黑刃杀死一个活物，魔战士获得等同黑刃觉醒度的临时生命值，持续1分钟。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your Black Blade takes the form of a Longsword.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的黑刃呈现出长剑的形态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Black Blade's mental stats increase by 1.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 黑刃的所有精神属性提升1。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At level 3 the you will gain a black blade that will grow stronger along side you.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级起，你会获得一把强力且具有自我意识的武器，它会随你的成长而成长。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your Black Blade takes the form of a Rapier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的黑刃呈现出细剑的形态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your Black Blade takes the form of a Scimitar.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的黑刃呈现出弯刀的形态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 3rd level, the bladebound magus’ gains a powerful sentient weapon called a black blade, whose weapon type is chosen by the magus. A magus with this class feature cannot take the familiar magus arcana, and cannot have a familiar of any kind, even from another class.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级时，剑缚魔战士会获得一把强力且拥有自我意识的武器，名为黑刃。它的武器类型由魔战士本人决定。拥有此能力的魔战士不能取得魔战士奥能中的「魔宠」奥秘，也不能以任何方式得到魔宠，即使是从别的职业而来。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your Black Blade takes the form of a Shortsword.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的黑刃呈现出短剑的形态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your Black Blade takes the form of a Sickle.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的黑刃呈现出镰刀的形态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A wielder of a black black of 17th level or higher can expend an arcane point from his weapon’s arcane pool as a free action; he then gains SR equal to his black blade’s ego until the start of his next turn.

A wielder of a black blade of 17th level or higher can expend an arcane point from his weapon’s arcane pool as a free action; he then gains SR equal to his black blade’s ego until the start of his next turn.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 17级起，魔战士以一个自由动作，从黑刃奥能池中消耗1点，直到他下回合开始前，他会获得等同于黑刃觉醒度的法术抗力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a free action, the magus can spend a point from the black blade’s arcane pool to grant the black blade a +1 bonus on damage rolls for 1 minute. For every four levels beyond 1st, this ability gives the black blade another +1 on damage rolls.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个自由动作，魔战士可以从黑刃的奥能池中消耗掉1点，并让黑刃因此在伤害骰上获得+1加值，持续1分钟。你在1级后每有4个魔战士等级，此能力给予黑刃的伤害骰加值再+1。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a free action, the magus can spend a point from the black blade’s arcane pool to grant the black blade a +1 bonus on damage rolls for 1 minute. For every four levels beyond 1st, this ability gives the black blade another +1 on damage rolls.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个自由动作，魔战士可以从黑刃的奥能池中消耗掉1点，并让黑刃因此在伤害骰上获得+1加值，持续1分钟。你在1级后每有4个魔战士等级，此能力给予黑刃的伤害骰加值再+1。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Black Blade gains a +1 bonus on damage rolls. For every four levels beyond 1st, this bonus increases by 1.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 黑刃在伤害骰上获得+1加值。你在1级后每有4个魔战士等级，此能力给予黑刃的伤害骰加值再+1。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 13th level a magus can attempt to siphon points from his black blade’s arcane pool into his own arcane pool. Doing so takes a full-round action and the magus must succeed at a Will saving throw with a DC equal to the black blade’s ego. If the magus succeeds, he regains 1 point to his arcane pool for every 2 points he saps from his black blade. If he fails the saving throw, the magus becomes fatigued. If he is fatigued, he becomes exhausted instead. He cannot use this ability if he is exhausted.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 13级起，以一个整轮动作，魔战士可以尝试从黑刃的奥能池中抽取奥能点，每抽取2点，他就能恢复1点自身的奥能点。若想这么做，魔战士必须通过DC等同黑刃觉醒度的意志检定，否则无法成功并陷入疲劳。如已经疲劳则改为力竭，如已经力竭，无法使用此能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Instead of the normal arcane pool amount, the bladebound magus’s arcane pool has a number of points equal to 1/3 his level (minimum 1) plus his Intelligence bonus.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 剑缚魔战士的奥能池只有1/3魔战士等级+智力调整值的奥能点。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A select group of magi are called to carry a black blade, a sentient weapon of often unknown and possibly unknowable purpose. These weapons become valuable tools and allies, as both the magus and weapon typically crave arcane power, but as a black blade becomes more aware, its true motivations manifest, and as does its ability to influence its wielder with its ever-increasing ego.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 有这么一群受选的魔战士，他们受命背负著名为黑刃的武具。这些武具默默无闻，有着智慧与不为人知的目的。对魔战士而言，这些武具既是甚有价值的工具，同时也是同伴──因为，剑和剑士，都同样渴求着奥法的力量。可是，当黑刃变的更加聪慧时，它的真正目的便会昭然若现，甚至它会用逐渐滋长的自我意识来影响持有者的意志。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, your limbs elongate and your reach increases by 5 feet.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 4级起，你的所有近战攻击触及范围增大5尺。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
There is a taint in your blood that is both alien and bizarre. When you bloodrage, this manifests in peculiar and terrifying ways.
While bloodraging, you gain the abilities and immunities of some aberrations, but show signs of your tainted heritage.
Bonus Feats: Combat Reflexes, Great Fortitude, Improved Disarm, Improved Dirty Trick, Improved Initiative, Improved Unarmed Strike, Iron Will.
Bonus Spells: Enlarge Person (7th), See Invisibility (10th), Displacement (13th), Spike Stones (16th).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的血液中蕴含着外来者和异怪的污染。当你处于血怒时，你身上的腐败会以异常而可怕的方式显现出来。
额外专长：战斗反射、钢铁意志、精通徒手打击、精通阴招、精通先攻、精通缴械、顽石强韧。
额外法术：变巨术、识破隐形、移位术、刺石术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Bonus Feats: Combat Reflexes, Great Fortitude, Improved Disarm, Improved Dirty Trick, Improved Initiative, Improved Unarmed Strike, Iron Will.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 额外专长：战斗反射、钢铁意志、精通徒手打击、精通阴招、精通先攻、精通缴械、顽石强韧。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 20th level, your body becomes truly unnatural. You are immune to critical hits and sneak attacks. In addition, you gain blindsight with a range of 60 feet and your bloodrager damage reduction increases by 1. You have these benefits constantly, even while not bloodraging.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 20级时，你的身体构造完全变成了非自然的形态。你获得100%护命、60尺盲视和可叠加的Dr 1/-。即使你不在血怒中也获得这些好处。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 8th level, you become immune to the sickened and nauseated conditions.
At 16th level, you are immune to disease, exhaustion, fatigue, and poison, and to the staggered condition.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 16级时，你免疫疾病、疲劳、力竭、恍惚和任何毒素效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 7th, 10th, 13th, and 16th levels, a bloodrager learns an additional spell derived from his bloodline.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在7、10、13、16级时，血怒者从血脉中学习一个额外法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 7th, 10th, 13th, and 16th levels, a bloodrager learns an additional spell derived from his bloodline.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在7、10、13、16级时，血怒者从血脉中学习一个额外法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 7th, 10th, 13th, and 16th levels, a bloodrager learns an additional spell derived from his bloodline.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在7、10、13、16级时，血怒者从血脉中学习一个额外法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 7th, 10th, 13th, and 16th levels, a bloodrager learns an additional spell derived from his bloodline.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在7、10、13、16级时，血怒者从血脉中学习一个额外法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, when you confirm a critical hit the target must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw or be staggered for 1 round. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 your bloodrager level + your Constitution modifier. These effects stack with the Staggering Critical feat; the target must save against each effect individually.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1级起，当你造成重击时，目标必须成功进行强韧豁免（DC = 10 + 1/2你的血脉狂怒者等级 + 你的体质调整值），否则恍惚1轮。这个效果与恍惚重击专长可以独立生效，目标必须对每个效果进行单独豁免。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 12th level, your internal anatomy shifts and changes, giving you a 50% chance to negate any critical hit or sneak attack that hits you. The damage is instead rolled normally.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 12级起，你的内部构造开始变换移动，你获得50%护命。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, when entering a bloodrage, you can choose to grow one size category larger than your base size (as enlarge person) even if you aren't humanoid.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 4级起，每当你进入血怒，你可以视同处于变巨术的效果下。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: True Arcane Bloodrage: Beast Shape IV (Shambling Mound)
True Arcane Bloodrage: Beast Shape IV (Smilodon)
True Arcane Bloodrage: Beast Shape IV (Wyvern)

At 1st level, as a free action up to three times per day you can grant yourself an insight bonus equal to 1/2 your bloodrager level (minimum 1) on one melee attack. At 12th level, you can use this ability up to five times per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1级起，每日至多3次，以自由动作，你能够使你的1次近战攻击获得洞察加值，数值等同于你的血脉狂怒者等级的1/2（最低为1）。12级起，该能力的每日使用次数提升至5次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your bloodline is destined for great things. When you bloodrage, you exude a greatness that makes all but the most legendary creatures seem lesser.
Your future greatness grants you the might to strike your enemies with awe.
Bonus Feats: Diehard, Endurance, Improved Initiative, Intimidating Prowess, Sieze The Moment, Lightning Reflexes, Weapon Focus.
Bonus Spells: Shield (7th), Blur (10th), Protection From Energy (13th), Freedom Of Movement (16th).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
血脉中的某种力量使你命中注定会成就伟业。当你处于血怒时，身上所散发出的伟大气息能够让大多数传说中的生物显得渺小而平凡，你未来的伟大赐予你令对手拜服的力量。
额外专长：顽强、坚韧、精通先攻、威逼、抓准时机、闪电反射、武器专攻。
额外法术：护盾术、朦胧术、抵抗能量、行动自如。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 8th level, you may reroll an attack roll once during a bloodrage. You must decide to use this ability after the die is rolled, but before the GM reveals the results. You must take the second result, even if it’s worse.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 8级起，每次血怒限1次，你可以重掷一次攻击检定。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 12th level, once per day when an attack or spell that deals damage would result in your death, you can attempt a DC 20 Fortitude save. If you succeed, you are instead reduced to 1 hit point; if you succeed and already have less than 1 hit point, you instead take no damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 12级起，每日1次，当一次造成伤害的攻击或法术会导致你的死亡时，你可以尝试一次DC为20的强韧豁免。若成功，你的生命值降至1点作为替代；若你检定成功，并且生命值已经低于1点，就不会受到伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, you gain a +1 luck bonus to AC and on saving throws. At 8th level and every 4 levels thereafter, this bonus increases by 1 (to a maximum of +5 at 20th level).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 4级起，你的AC以及豁免检定获得+1幸运加值。8级以及之后每4个等级，这个加值都会增加1点（最高为20级时的+5点）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Bonus Feats: Diehard, Endurance, Improved Initiative, Intimidating Prowess, Sieze The Moment, Lightning Reflexes, Weapon Focus.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 额外专长：顽强、坚韧、精通先攻、威逼、抓准时机、闪电反射、武器专攻。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 7th, 10th, 13th, and 16th levels, a bloodrager learns an additional spell derived from his bloodline.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在7、10、13、16级时，血怒者从血脉中学习一个额外法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 7th, 10th, 13th, and 16th levels, a bloodrager learns an additional spell derived from his bloodline.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在7、10、13、16级时，血怒者从血脉中学习一个额外法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 7th, 10th, 13th, and 16th levels, a bloodrager learns an additional spell derived from his bloodline.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在7、10、13、16级时，血怒者从血脉中学习一个额外法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 7th, 10th, 13th, and 16th levels, a bloodrager learns an additional spell derived from his bloodline.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在7、10、13、16级时，血怒者从血脉中学习一个额外法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can grant yourself an insight bonus equal to 1/2 your bloodrager level (minimum 1) on one melee attack.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 给予你下一次近战攻击1/2血怒者等级的洞察加值。
命运打击额外使用次数

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 16th level, any critical threats you score are automatically confirmed. Any critical threats made against you confirm only if the second roll results in a natural 20 (or is automatically confirmed).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 16级起，任何由你做出的重击威胁自动确认，任何对你造成的重击威胁只有在确认检定投出20才能确认。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 20th level, you are immune to paralysis and petrification, as well as to the stunned, dazed, and staggered conditions. You have these benefits constantly, even while not bloodraging.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 20级起，你免疫麻痹、石化、震慑、晕眩和恍惚。即便没有处于血怒之时，你也会一直获得这些效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The magus selects another one of his spellcasting classes. The magus can use his spellstrike and spell combat abilities while casting or using spells from the spell list of that class. This does not allow him to cast arcane spells from that class’s spell list without suffering the normal chances of arcane spell failure, unless the spell lacks somatic components.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 魔战士选择他已有的另一个施法职业，他可以用这个职业的法术进行法术战斗或法术打击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A cavalier does not take an armor check penalty on Mobility checks while riding his mount.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 骑将在骑乘时忽略护甲对灵巧技能的减值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A cavalier does not take an armor check penalty on Mobility checks while riding his mount.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 骑将在骑乘时忽略护甲对灵巧技能的减值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your animal companion, familiar, or mount gains the celestial template and becomes a magical beast, though you may still treat it as an animal when using Handle Animal, wild empathy, or any other spells or class abilities that specifically affect animals.
Creature gains spell resistance equal to its level + 5. It also gains:
1 — 4 HD: resistance 5 to cold, acid, and electricity.
5 — 10 HD: resistance 10 to cold, acid, and electricity, DR 5/evil
11+ HD: resistance 15 to cold, acid, and electricity, DR 10/evil
Smite Evil (Su): Once per day, the celestial creature may smite a evil-aligned creature. As a swift action, the creature chooses one target within sight to smite. If this target is evil, the creature adds its Charisma bonus (if any) to attack rolls and gains a damage bonus equal to its HD against that foe. This effect persists until the target is dead or the creature rests.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的动物伙伴获得天界模板。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: While most clerics who fall out of favor with their deities simply lose their divine connection and the powers it granted, a few continue to go through the motions of prayer and obedience, persisting in the habits of faith even when their faith itself has faded. Among these, an even smaller number find that while their original deity no longer answers their prayers, something else does: an unknown entity or force of the universe channeling its power through a trained and practicing vessel.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 尽管他们也曾投身于某种特定的信仰，但有些牧师却因为种种原因失去了与神的精神联系。他们中的一部分仍在继续祷告和传教，尽管他们已经断绝了和信仰的联系，甚至信仰本身也已经不再存在。这些人中的一部分意识到他们的信仰已经不再依附于任何特定实体，而是系于无尽飘渺的多元宇宙本身。此变体来自Mod: TableTopTweaks，译者：1onepower。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Channeling entropy causes a burst that damages all creatures in a 30-foot radius centered on the cleric. The amount of damage inflicted is equal to 1d6 points of damage plus 1d6 points of damage for every two cleric levels beyond 1st (2d6 at 3rd, 3d6 at 5th, and so on). Creatures that take damage from channeled energy receive a Will save to halve the damage. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 the cleric's level + the cleric's Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 熵化导能师不能引导正能量或负能量，取而代之的是引导熵化能量。这种能量对范围内任何生物造成标准导能伤害。伤害为1d6外加超过1的每两个职业等级额外1d6，可以通过10+1/2职业等级+魅力调整值的意志豁免减半。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A channeler of the unknown can channel entropy as a cleric channels negative or positive energy, releasing a wave of twisting void that harms creatures in the area of effect. The amount of damage dealt is equal to that an evil cleric of her level would deal by channeling negative energy, except it affects living, unliving, and undead creatures alike. This functions in all other ways as a cleric’s channel energy class feature, including benefiting from feats that affect channel energy (such as Selective Channeling).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 熵化导能师不能引导正能量或负能量，取而代之的是引导熵化能量。这种能量对范围内任何生物造成标准导能伤害。伤害为1d6外加超过1的每两个职业等级额外1d6，可以通过10+1/2职业等级+魅力调整值的意志豁免减半。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A channeler of the unknown has lost the benefit of the domains granted by her deity, but the unknown entity that answers her supplications instead grants her the benefits of one domain from the following list: Darkness, Destruction, Luck, Madness, or Void. Instead of a single domain spell slot, the channeler of the unknown gains two domain spell slots per spell level she can cast. A channeler of the unknown cannot select a subdomain in place of the domain available to her.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 熵化导能师只能选择一个领域，并且只能从如下列表选择：黑暗、破坏、幸运、疯狂。但熵化导能师在每个等级上获得两个领域法术位。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Channelers Of The Unknown are proficient with all simple weapons, light armor, medium armor, and shields (except tower shields).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 熵化导能师擅长简单武器、轻型和中型盔甲，以及非塔盾的盾牌。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Instead of converting prepared spells into cure or inflict spells, a channeler of the unknown can channel stored spell energy into her domain spells.
She can lose a prepared spell, including a domain spell, to spontaneously cast a domain spell of the same spell level or lower.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 熵化导能师不能像正常牧师一样将任何法术转换为同环治疗或伤害法术。取而代之的是可以将任何法术转换为同环或低环的领域法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A channeler of the unknown loses proficiency with her deity’s favored weapon. She instead gains proficiency with one martial or exotic weapon, chosen when she first takes this archetype, which thereafter effectively functions as her holy or unholy symbol for the purposes of class abilities and spellcasting. Once she makes this choice, she can’t later change it.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 作为擅长神祗偏好武器擅长的替代，熵化导能师擅长任何一种他选择的军用或异种武器。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
As a full-round action, you can use a melee weapon to deliver a coup de grace to a helpless opponent.
You automatically hit and score a critical hit. If the defender survives the damage, he must make a Fortitude save (DC 10 + damage dealt) or die. A rogue also gets her extra sneak attack damage against a helpless opponent when delivering a coup de grace.
Delivering a coup de grace provokes attacks of opportunity from threatening opponents.
You can’t deliver a coup de grace against a creature that is immune to critical hits.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个整轮动作，你可以使用一把近战武器试图处决一个处于无助状态的目标。你无需进行攻击检定和重击确认检定就命中一次重击，除去受到的伤害之外，对方须做DC为（10+此次重击造成的伤害）的强韧豁免检定，若失败则立即死亡，无视再生效果。(此条与原版不同，因为在TTT设置中开启了修复致命一击)

LocalizedStrings.enGB: While wearing armor or using a shield, the fighter gains a +2 bonus to his AC against attack rolls made to confirm a critical hit. This bonus increases by 1 at 7th level and every 4 fighter levels thereafter, to a maximum of +6 at 19th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当你穿甲或持盾时，你对抗重击确认检定的AC额外提升2，在7/11/15/19级各额外加1。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A crossblooded sorcerer has one fewer spell known at each level than regular sorcerer.
Furthermore, the conflicting urges created by the divergent nature of the crossblooded sorcerer’s dual heritage forces her to constantly take some mental effort just to remain focused on her current situation and needs. This leaves her with less mental resolve to deal with external threats. A crossblooded sorcerer always takes a -2 penalty on Will saves.

The fighter gains a +1 shield bonus to his Armor Class. The fighter adds half his weapon’s enhancement bonus (if any) to this shield bonus. When his weapon training bonus for weapons from the associated fighter weapon group reaches +4, this shield bonus increases to +2. This shield bonus is lost if the fighter is immobilized or helpless.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 战士获得(1+主手武器增强加值)的盾牌AC，即使没有持盾。如果你对此武器的训练有+4，盾牌AC额外+1。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: When wielding a scimitar with one hand, you can use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier on melee attack and damage rolls. You treat the scimitar as a one-handed piercing weapon for all feats and class abilities that require such a weapon (such as a duelist’s precise strike ability). The scimitar must be for a creature of your size. You cannot use this feat if you are carrying a weapon or shield (other than a buckler) in your off hand.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当你持有一把弯刀且另一手空置时，你用敏捷取代力量作为伤害调整值。此外你将弯刀视为刺击而非挥砍武器。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This functions as a targeted dispel magic, but it can dispel one spell for every four caster levels you possess, starting with the highest level spells and proceeding to lower level spells.
Targeted Dispel: One object, creature, or spell is the target of the dispel magic spell. You make one dispel check (1d20 + your caster level) and compare that to the spell with highest caster level (DC = 11 + the spell’s caster level). If successful, that spell ends. If not, compare the same result to the spell with the next highest caster level. Repeat this process until you have dispelled one spell affecting the target, or you have failed to dispel every spell.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这个法术如同解除魔法（目标），但你每有4CL，就可以尝试解除一项效果，从目标身上最高级的法术开始向下顺序尝试。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Some warpriests are called to lead great armies and face legions of foes. These divine commanders live for war and fight for glory. Their hearts quicken at battle cries, and they charge forth with their deity’s symbol held high. These leaders of armies do so to promote the agenda of their faith, and lead armies of devoted followers willing to give their lives for the cause.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 圣战指挥官是战斗祭祀和骑将的混合体，以征服与胜利作为自己荣耀神祇的方式，她以神的名义统御军团，并亲自冲锋在前。圣徽飘扬、战吼震天时，圣战指挥官常常骑着骏马身先士卒，引领着圣教军取得一场又一场光荣的胜利。此变体来自Mod: TableTopTweaks，译者：1onepower。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 3rd level, a divine commander gains a teamwork feat as a bonus feat. She must meet the prerequisites for this feat. As a standard action, the divine commander can grant this feat to all allies within 30 feet who can see and hear her. Allies retain the use of this bonus feat for 4 rounds, plus 1 round for every 2 levels beyond 3rd that the divine commander possesses. Allies do not need to meet the prerequisites of this bonus feat. The divine commander can use this ability once per day at 3rd level, plus one additional time per day at 9th and 15th levels.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级时圣战指挥官额外获得一个团队专长，她必须满足先决条件。以一个标准动作，圣战指挥官可以将此专长分享给30尺内所有盟友，持续4轮，超过3的职业等级每两级提供额外一轮持续时间。3/9/15级圣战指挥官每日可使用1/2/3次此能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 12th level, the divine commander gains an additional teamwork feat as a bonus feat. She must meet the prerequisites for this feat. The divine commander can grant this feat to her allies using the battle tactician ability. Additionally, using the battle tactician ability is now a swift action.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 12级起，你再获得一个团队专长。此外，你可以以迅捷动作使用战场战术家能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 3rd level, a divine commander gains a teamwork feat as a bonus feat. She must meet the prerequisites for this feat. As a standard action, the divine commander can grant this feat to all allies within 30 feet who can see and hear her. Allies retain the use of this bonus feat for 4 rounds, plus 1 round for every 2 levels beyond 3rd that the divine commander possesses. Allies do not need to meet the prerequisites of this bonus feat. The divine commander can use this ability once per day at 3rd level, plus one additional time per day at 9th and 15th levels.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级时圣战指挥官额外获得一个团队专长，她必须满足先决条件。以一个标准动作，圣战指挥官可以将此专长分享给30尺内所有盟友，持续4轮，超过3的职业等级每两级提供额外一轮持续时间。3/9/15级圣战指挥官每日可使用1/2/3次此能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 6th level, a divine commander’s mount becomes a creature blessed by his deity. The divine commander’s mount gains either the celestial, entropic, fiendish, or resolute template, matching the alignment of the warpriest (celestial for good, entropic for chaotic, fiendish for evil, and resolute for lawful). If the warpriest matches more than one alignment, the divine commander can select which of the two templates the mount receives. Once the type of template is selected, it cannot be changed.
If the divine commander is neutral with no other alignment components, she may select any template.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 6级时，圣战指挥官的坐骑被她的信念所保佑，根据她的阵营，坐骑获得某一阵营的简单模板。如果圣战指挥官在两个阵营轴都非中立，她可以任选其一。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Animal Companion gains spell resistance equal to its level +5. It also gains:
1 — 4 HD: resistance 5 to cold, acid, and electricity.
5 — 10 HD: resistance 10 to cold, acid, and electricity, DR 5/evil
11+ HD: resistance 15 to cold, acid, and electricity, DR 10/evil
Smite Evil (Su): Once per day, the celestial creature may smite a evil-aligned creature. As a swift action, the creature chooses one target within sight to smite. If this target is evil, the creature adds its Charisma bonus (if any) to attack rolls and gains a damage bonus equal to its HD against that foe. This effect persists until the target is dead or the creature rests.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
动物伙伴获得等同其等级+5的法术抗力，此外：
1级: 5点寒、酸、电抗
5级: 10点寒、酸、电抗, DR 5/邪恶
11级: 15点寒、酸、电抗, DR 10/邪恶
辟邪斩: 每日一次，此天界生物可以制裁邪恶生物，以一个迅捷动作，选择视野范围内的一个邪恶生物，获得等同此动物伙伴魅力加值(如为加值)的攻击加值，和等同此动物伙伴等级的伤害加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Animal Companion gains spell resistance equal to its level +5. It also gains:
1 — 4 HD: resistance 5 to acid and fire.
5 — 10 HD: resistance 10 to acid and fire, DR 5/lawful
11+ HD: resistance 15 to acid and fire, DR 10/lawful
Smite Law (Su): Once per day, the entropic creature may smite a law-aligned creature. As a swift action, the creature chooses one target within sight to smite. If this target is lawful, the creature adds its Charisma bonus (if any) to attack rolls and gains a damage bonus equal to its HD against that foe. This effect persists until the target is dead or the creature rests.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
动物伙伴获得等同其等级+5的法术抗力，此外：
1级: 5点火、酸抗
5级: 10点火、酸抗, DR 5/守序
11级: 15点火、酸抗, DR 10/守序
制裁守序: 每日一次，此熵化生物可以制裁守序生物，以一个迅捷动作，选择视野范围内的一个守序生物，获得等同此动物伙伴魅力加值(如为加值)的攻击加值，和等同此动物伙伴等级的伤害加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Animal Companion gains spell resistance equal to its level +5. It also gains:
1 — 4 HD: resistance 5 to cold and fire.
5 — 10 HD: resistance 10 to cold and fire, DR 5/good
11+ HD: resistance 15 to cold and fire, DR 10/good
Smite Good (Su): Once per day, the fiendish creature may smite a good-aligned creature. As a swift action, the creature chooses one target within sight to smite. If this target is good, the creature adds its Charisma bonus (if any) to attack rolls and gains a damage bonus equal to its HD against that foe. This effect persists until the target is dead or the creature rests.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
动物伙伴获得等同其等级+5的法术抗力，此外：
1级: 5点寒、火抗
5级: 10点寒、火抗, DR 5/善良
11级: 15点寒、火抗, DR 10/善良
制裁善良: 每日一次，此炼狱生物可以制裁善良生物，以一个迅捷动作，选择视野范围内的一个善良生物，获得等同此动物伙伴魅力加值(如为加值)的攻击加值，和等同此动物伙伴等级的伤害加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Animal Companion gains spell resistance equal to its level +5. It also gains:
1 — 4 HD: resistance 5 to acid, cold and fire.
5 — 10 HD: resistance 10 to acid, cold and fire, DR 5/chaotic
11+ HD: resistance 15 to acid, cold and fire, DR 10/chaotic
Smite Chaos (Su): Once per day, the resolute creature may smite a chaos-aligned creature. As a swift action, the creature chooses one target within sight to smite. If this target is chaotic, the creature adds its Charisma bonus (if any) to attack rolls and gains a damage bonus equal to its HD against that foe. This effect persists until the target is dead or the creature rests.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
动物伙伴获得等同其等级+5的法术抗力，此外：
1级: 5点寒、火、酸抗
5级: 10点寒、火、酸抗, DR 5/混乱
11级: 15点寒、火、酸抗, DR 10/混乱
制裁混乱: 每日一次，此秩序生物可以制裁混乱生物，以一个迅捷动作，选择视野范围内的一个混乱生物，获得等同此动物伙伴魅力加值(如为加值)的攻击加值，和等同此动物伙伴等级的伤害加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A divine commander gains the service of a loyal and trusty steed to carry her into battle. This mount functions as a druid’s animal companion, using the divine commander’s level as her effective druid level. The creature must be one that she is capable of riding and must be suitable as a mount. A Medium divine commander can select a horse. A Small divine commander can select a wolf A divine commander does not take an armor check penalty on Mobility checks while riding this mount.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 圣战指挥官在1级时获得动物伙伴，以职业等级作为德鲁伊等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A divine commander does not take an armor check penalty on Mobility checks while riding his mount.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 圣战指挥官在骑乘时，忽略任何盔甲对灵巧的减值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A divine commander does not take an armor check penalty on Mobility checks while riding his mount.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 圣战指挥官在骑乘时，忽略任何盔甲对灵巧的减值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dwarves are both tough and wise, but also a bit gruff. They gain +2 Constitution, +2 Wisdom, and –2 Charisma.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 矮人获得+2体质，+2感知和-2魅力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The following alternate traits are available.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 有以下种族替换特性可选

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Some dwarves use their unwavering stubbornness to get what they want in negotiations and other business matters. They gain a +2 racial bonus on Persuasion checks and Persuasion is a class skill for them.
This racial trait replaces defensive training, hatred.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 一些矮人利用他们固执的天性在谈判和其他商业事务中得到他们想要的东西。交涉设为本职技能并获得+2天赋加值。这个特性取代防御训练和世代血仇。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Not all dwarves are as standoffish and distrusting as their peers, though they can be seen as foolhardy and brash by their kin. Dwarves with this racial trait gain +2 Constitution, +2 Charisma, and -2 Intelligence.
This racial trait alters the dwarves’ ability score modifiers.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 不是所有的矮人都和同族一样冷漠，但他们的直率和热心肠也常常被认为是莽撞。获得+2体质，+2魅力和-2智力。这取代矮人属性调整。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become proficient with earth breakers and can use them as a weapon.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你擅长裂地锤，可以把它们作为武器。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Elves are nimble, both in body and mind, but their form is frail. They gain +2 Dexterity, +2 Intelligence, and –2 Constitution.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 精灵获得+2敏捷，+2智力和-2体质。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Some elven families have such long traditions of producing wizards (and other arcane spellcasters) that they raise their children with the assumption each is destined to be a powerful magic-user, with little need for mundane concerns such as skill with weapons. Elves with this racial trait gain a +2 racial bonus on concentration checks.
This racial trait replaces weapon familiarity.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 有些精灵家族有很长的培育奥术施法者的历史，接受这种教育的精灵往往不会受到足够多的战斗技法训练。你的专注检定获得+2种族加值，但不获得精灵武器熟练。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Having returned to Golarion to reclaim their ancestral homeland, some elves of the Fierani Forest have a closer bond to nature than most of their kin. Elves with this racial trait gain +2 Dexterity, +2 Wisdom, and -2 Constitution.
This racial trait alters the elves’ ability score modifiers.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 有些菲拉尼森林中的精灵与自然有更深的联系，他们返回格拉利昂并试图夺回祖先的家乡。你获得+2敏捷，+2感知和-2体质。这取代精灵属性调整。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Elves with this racial trait have a base move speed of 35 feet.
This racial trait replaces weapon familiarity.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的基础移动速度提升5尺，但失去精灵武器熟练。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Elves with this alternate racial trait gain a +1 racial bonus on saving throws.
This replaces elven immunities and keen senses.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你在所有豁免检定获得+1种族加值，但失去精灵免疫和敏锐直觉。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You gain a +2 dodge bonus to AC against attacks by chaotic creatures.
This trait replaces elven magic.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你面对混乱生物的攻击时获得+2闪避AC，失去精灵魔力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Harsh conditions or long exertions do not easily tire you.
Benefit: You gain +4 bonus on Fortitude saves against fatigue and exhaustion and +2 bonus on Athletics checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in Athletics, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
You may sleep in light or medium armor without becoming fatigued.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你对抗疲劳和力竭的强韧豁免获得+4加值，运动获得+2加值。如果你的运动至少有10级，改为+4运动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your deity grants you prowess with a bow that far exceeds your own physical capabilities.
You can use your Wisdom modifier instead of your Dexterity modifier on ranged attack rolls when using a bow.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你用感知取代敏捷作为用弓进行远程攻击的攻击调整值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You gain one additional magus arcana. You must meet all the prerequisites for this magus arcana.
You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects stack, granting a new arcana each time you gain this feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你获得一项额外魔战士奥秘，你需要满足先决条件。此专长可选择多次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You gain one additional magus arcana. You must meet all the prerequisites for this magus arcana.
You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects stack, granting a new arcana each time you gain this feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你获得一项额外魔战士奥秘，你需要满足先决条件。此专长可选择多次。
额外魔战士奥秘（奥法后继者）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You gain one additional magus arcana. You must meet all the prerequisites for this magus arcana.
You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects stack, granting a new arcana each time you gain this feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你获得一项额外魔战士奥秘，你需要满足先决条件。此专长可选择多次。
额外魔战士奥秘（巫战士）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You gain one additional arcanist exploit. You must meet the prerequisites for this arcanist exploit.
You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another arcanist exploit.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你获得一项额外奥能技艺，你需要满足先决条件。此专长可选择多次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You gain one additional discovery. You must meet all of the prerequisites for this discovery.
You can gain Extra Discovery multiple times.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你获得一项额外科研发现，你需要满足先决条件。此专长可选择多次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You gain one additional medical discovery. You must meet all of the prerequisites for this discovery.
You can gain Extra Medical Discovery multiple times.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你获得一项额外科研发现，你需要满足先决条件。此专长可选择多次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You gain one additional hex. You must meet the prerequisites for this hex.If you are a shaman, it must be a hex granted by your spirit rather than one from a wandering spirit.
You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another hex.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你获得一项额外巫术，你需要满足先决条件。此专长可选择多次。不能用此专长获取游荡精魂巫术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You gain one additional hex. You must meet the prerequisites for this hex.
You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another hex.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你获得一项额外巫术，你需要满足先决条件。此专长可选择多次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your ki pool increases by 2.
You can take this feat multiple times. Its effects stack.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的气海池增大2点，此专长可选择多次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Select one additional mercy for which you qualify. When you use lay on hands to heal damage to one target, it also receives the additional effects of this mercy.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你获得一项额外救赎，你需要满足先决条件。此专长可选择多次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You gain 3 more points in your arcane reservoir, and the maximum number of points in your arcane reservoir increases by that amount.
You can take this feat multiple times. Its effects stack.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你获得3点额外奥能点，此专长可选择多次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You gain one additional revelation. You must meet all of the prerequisites for this revelation.
You can gain Extra Revelation multiple times.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你获得一项额外启示，你需要满足先决条件。此专长可选择多次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You gain one additional rogue talent. You must meet all of the prerequisites for this rogue talent.
You can gain Extra Rogue Talent multiple times.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你获得一项额外游荡者天赋，你需要满足先决条件。此专长可选择多次。
额外游荡者天赋(林妖诡术师)

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You gain one additional slayer talent. You must meet the prerequisites for this slayer talent.
You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another slayer talent.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你获得一项额外杀手绝技，你需要满足先决条件。此专长可选择多次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This works exactly like Favorite Enemy (Outsider) and exists for existing build compatability. If you already have this feature continue taking ranks to progress Favored Enemy Outsider properly.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 来自TableTopTweaks: 这一选择项的效果与宿敌（异界生物）完全相同，你不能在选新宿敌时选择它。这是一个占位符，作用是避免破坏一个已经选择了此宿敌的存档。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
The fighter selects one weapon for which he has Weapon Focus and that belongs to the associated fighter weapon group. The fighter can deal damage with this weapon based on the damage of the warpriest’s sacred weapon class feature, treating his fighter level as his warpriest level. The fighter must have Weapon Focus and Weapon Training with the selected weapon in order to choose this option.
A focused weapon deals 1d6 damage, this increases to 1d8 at level 6, 1d10 at level 10, 2d6 at level 15, and 2d8 at level 20
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 战士选择一类武器，他可以使用战斗祭祀的神圣武器的武器骰替代原本的武器伤害骰，以战士等级作为战斗祭祀等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Gnomes are physically weak but surprisingly hardy, and their attitude makes them naturally agreeable. They gain +2 Constitution, +2 Charisma, and –2 Strength.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 侏儒获得+2体质，+2魅力和-2力量。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Some gnomes lack their race’s iconic humor and propensity for pranks, instead devoting nearly all of their time and energy to their crafts. Such gnomes gain +2 Constitution, +2 Intelligence, and -2 Strength.
This racial trait alters the gnomes’ ability score modifiers.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 有些侏儒不像同辈一样幽默，但他们在艺术作品上有非凡天赋。你转而获得+2体质，+2智力和-2力量。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Gnomes add +1 to the DC of any saving throws against necromancy spells that they cast.
This racial trait replaces gnome magic
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这些侏儒的死灵系法术获得+1DC，这一特性取代侏儒魔法。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Gnomes have a knack for being in places they shouldn’t be. Gnomes with this trait gain a +2 racial bonus on Trickery and Mobility checks. 
This racial trait replaces keen senses and obsessive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你获得+2巧手和灵巧，这一特性取代敏锐感官和苦心孤诣。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Some gnomes are far more cleaver than they seem, and have devoted all of their time in the pursit of knowledge. Such gnomes gain +2 Charisma, +2 Intelligence, and -2 Strength.
This racial trait alters the gnomes’ ability score modifiers.
This racial trait replaces defensive training
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 有些侏儒比他们看起来的要聪明得多，并且一生投身于追寻无尽的知识。你转而获得+2魅力，+2智力和-2力量。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You gain a +4 bonus on saves against disease and poison, including magical diseases.
This racial trait replaces obsessive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你对抗毒素和疾病的豁免获得+4加值，这一特性取代苦心孤诣。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Some gnomes develop practical magic to assist them with their obsessive projects. These gnomes add 1 to the DC of any saving throws against transmutation spells they cast.
This racial trait replaces gnome magic
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这些侏儒的变化系法术获得+1DC，这一特性取代侏儒魔法。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Add your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength bonus to Athletics checks. This feat grants no benefit to creatures that already add their Dexterity modifier to Athletics checks (such as all Tiny or smaller creatures).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 用敏捷取代力量作为运动调整值。如果你已经有另一个效果可以使用敏捷作为运动调整值，不会获得两倍调整值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Halflings are nimble and strong-willed, but their small stature makes them weaker than other races. They gain +2 Dexterity, +2 Charisma, and –2 Strength.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 半身人获得+2敏捷，+2魅力和-2力量。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Halflings with this trait receive a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against curse effects and hexes. This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by halfling luck.
This racial trait replaces fearless.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你在对抗诅咒法术和巫术时豁免获得+2种族加值，这个特性取代无畏。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A lifetime of brutal survival, either under the heavy burdens of slavery or on the streets, has made some halflings more adept at taking blows than dodging them. Halflings with this racial trait gain +2 Constitution, +2 Charisma, and -2 Dexterity. This racial trait alters the halflings’ ability score modifiers.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 一些半身人经过了一生的艰苦劳作甚至奴役，为了在这种条件下生存，他们锻炼出的力量已经显著高于同辈。你转而获得+2体质，+2魅力和-2敏捷。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Halflings from poor and desperate communities, most often in big cities, must take what they need without getting caught in order to survive. They gain a +2 racial bonus on Persuasion and Stealth checks.
This racial trait replaces sure-footed.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 有些半身人在特别贫穷和绝望的环境中长大，生存逼迫他们锻炼出了一些非同寻常的技俩。你获得+2交涉和隐匿。这一特性取代锐足。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Halflings must train hard to effectively fight bigger opponents. Halflings with this racial trait gain a +1 dodge bonus to AC against foes larger than themselves.
This racial trait replaces halfling luck.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 半身人为了有效的与比他大的生物战斗而努力锻炼。在面对比他大的生物时，他的AC得到+1闪避加值，对抗践踏的反射豁免检定+1。这个特性取代半身人幸运。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, the mystic theurge selects a divine spellcasting class she belonged to before adding the prestige class. When a new mystic theurge level is gained, the character gains new spells per day and new spells known as if she had also gained a level in that spellcasting class.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1级时，秘术师选择一个他已有的神术施法职业，将你的秘术师等级加在原职业的SCL上。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, the mystic theurge selects a divine spellcasting class she belonged to before adding the prestige class. When a new mystic theurge level is gained, the character gains new spells per day and new spells known as if she had also gained a level in that spellcasting class.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1级时，秘术师选择一个他已有的神术施法职业，将你的秘术师等级加在原职业的SCL上。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your base land speed increases by 30 feet plus an additional 5 feet for every mythic rank.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的基础移动速度额外提高30+5*神话等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Add 2 to the DC of saving throws made to resist the effects of your channel energy ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 抵抗你的能量引导效果的豁免DC+2。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your arms temporarily grow in length, increasing your reach with those limbs by 5 feet.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的所有近战攻击的触及范围提升5尺。
牧师法表 - 吟游诗人
牧师法表 - 战斗祭祀
德鲁伊法表 - 奥能师
德鲁伊法表 - 吟游诗人
德鲁伊法表 - 血怒者
德鲁伊法表 - 审判官
德鲁伊法表 - 魔战士
德鲁伊法表 - 圣武士
德鲁伊法表 - 游荡者
德鲁伊法表 - 战斗祭祀

LocalizedStrings.enGB: When a new loremaster level is gained, the character gains new spells per day as if he had also gained a level in a spellcasting class he belonged to before adding the prestige class. He does not, however, gain other benefits a character of that class would have gained, except for additional spells per day, spells known (if he is a spontaneous spellcaster), and an increased effective level of spellcasting. If a character had more than one spellcasting class before becoming a loremaster, he must decide to which class he adds the new level for purposes of determining spells per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 选择另一个你已有的施法职业，在该职业上获得等同博学士等级的SCL。
法师法表 - 吟游诗人
法师法表 - 战斗祭祀

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are skilled at spellcasting and using magic items.
You get a +2 bonus on Knowledge (Arcana) and Use Magic Device skill checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你在施法上受过特别的训练。你在知识(神秘)和使用魔法物品上获得+2加值，如果这两项技能均有至少10级，改为+4。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You gain a new spell-like ability, each usable twice per day, from the following list, in order:
1. vanish
2. hideous laughter
3. blur
4. invisibility
5. heroism
6. displacement
7. confusion
8. dominate person.
For example, the first time you select this feat, you gain vanish 2/day; the second time you select this feat, you gain hideous laughter 2/day. Your caster level for these spells is equal to your Hit Dice. The DCs for these abilities are Charisma-based.
You may select this feat up to eight times. Each time you take it, you gain an additional ability as described above.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 通过多次选择此专长，你获得一些每日可以各用两次的类法术能力，按顺序：渐隐术、狂笑术、朦胧术、隐形术、英雄气概、移位术、困惑术、支配他人。你可以选择此专长至多8次，每次选择时按顺序获得下一个法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 20th level, the rogue has been a thief, an actor, a merchant, a scout, a confessor, a friend, an assassin, and a dozen more things besides. The rogue gains a +4 bonus on all of her skills.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 20级时，你在所有技能鉴定上获得+4加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An espionage expert gets a bonus equal to 1/2 her level on Perception checks and Trickery checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 谍报专家在察觉和巧手上获得职业等级一半的加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: While metamagic is difficult for many bloodragers to utilize, a talented few are able to channel their bloodrage in ways that push their spells to impressive ends.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 超魔对于许多血脉狂怒者来说都十分难以使用，仅有少数人具有以某种方式引导血怒，并将自身的魔法推至极限的能力。此变体来自Mod: TableTopTweaks，译者：1onepower。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 5th level, a metamagic rager can sacrifice additional rounds of bloodrage to apply a metamagic feat he knows to a bloodrager spell. This costs a number of rounds of bloodrage equal to twice what the spell’s adjusted level would normally be with the metamagic feat applied (minimum 2 rounds). The metamagic rager does not have to be bloodraging to use this ability. The metamagic effect is applied without increasing the level of the spell slot expended, though the casting time is increased as normal. The metamagic rager can apply only one metamagic feat he knows in this manner with each casting.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 5级起，超魔狂怒者能够通过牺牲血怒的额外轮数的方式，来将他已知的超魔专长应用至血脉狂怒者法术上。血怒的消耗轮数等同于正常应用超魔专长时调整的法术等级的两倍（最低2轮，即使有“偏好超魔”神话能力）。超魔狂怒者并不需要进入血怒便能使用该能力，应用超魔效果也不会增加被消耗的法术位等级，但仍会如任何自发施法者超魔一样使用整轮施法。超魔狂怒者每次施法时仅能以此方式将一个他已知的超魔专长应用至法术上。此外，当超魔狂怒者选取血脉专长时，可以选择获取一个超魔专长作为替代。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 5th level, a metamagic rager can sacrifice additional rounds of bloodrage to apply a metamagic feat he knows to a bloodrager spell. This costs a number of rounds of bloodrage equal to twice what the spell’s adjusted level would normally be with the metamagic feat applied (minimum 2 rounds). The metamagic rager does not have to be bloodraging to use this ability. The metamagic effect is applied without increasing the level of the spell slot expended, though the casting time is increased as normal. The metamagic rager can apply only one metamagic feat he knows in this manner with each casting.

The metamagic rager does not have to be bloodraging to use this ability. The metamagic effect is applied without increasing the level of the spell slot expended, though the casting time is increased as normal. The metamagic rager can apply only one metamagic feat he knows in this manner with each casting.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 5级起，超魔狂怒者能够通过牺牲血怒的额外轮数的方式，来将他已知的超魔专长应用至血脉狂怒者法术上。血怒的消耗轮数等同于正常应用超魔专长时调整的法术等级的两倍（最低2轮，即使有“偏好超魔”神话能力）。超魔狂怒者并不需要进入血怒便能使用该能力，应用超魔效果也不会增加被消耗的法术位等级，但仍会如任何自发施法者超魔一样使用整轮施法。超魔狂怒者每次施法时仅能以此方式将一个他已知的超魔专长应用至法术上。此外，当超魔狂怒者选取血脉专长时，可以选择获取一个超魔专长作为替代。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 5th level, a metamagic rager can sacrifice additional rounds of bloodrage to apply a metamagic feat he knows to a bloodrager spell. This costs a number of rounds of bloodrage equal to twice what the spell’s adjusted level would normally be with the metamagic feat applied (minimum 2 rounds). The metamagic rager does not have to be bloodraging to use this ability. The metamagic effect is applied without increasing the level of the spell slot expended, though the casting time is increased as normal. The metamagic rager can apply only one metamagic feat he knows in this manner with each casting.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your unstoppable momentum while mounted is terrifying. Whenever you charge a creature while mounted, you can attempt an Intimidate check to demoralize all enemies within 30 feet of your target, adding your mythic rank to the result of the check.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的骑乘冲锋有着难以想象的威势。当你骑乘冲锋时，你对周围30尺的所有敌人尝试打击士气，并将神话阶层加在沟通检定上。
