LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, the mystic theurge selects a divine spellcasting class she belonged to before adding the prestige class. When a new mystic theurge level is gained, the character gains new spells per day and new spells known as if she had also gained a level in that spellcasting class.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1级时，秘术师选择一个他已有的神术施法职业，他将秘术师等级加在该职业的SCL上。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, the mystic theurge selects a divine spellcasting class she belonged to before adding the prestige class. When a new mystic theurge level is gained, the character gains new spells per day and new spells known as if she had also gained a level in that spellcasting class.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1级时，秘术师选择一个他已有的神术施法职业，他将秘术师等级加在该职业的SCL上。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The magus can use his spell combat and spellstrike abilities while casting or using spells from a spellbook granted by a mythic class.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 魔战士可以用任何道途法术书的法术施展法术战斗。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Starting at 12th level, a Nature Fang can select an advanced slayer talent in place of a slayer talent.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 12级时，自然之牙可以选择进阶杀手绝技以替代杀手绝技。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A nature fang is a druid who stalks and slays those who despoil nature, kill scarce animals, or introduce diseases to unprotected habitats. She gives up a close empathic connection with the natural world to become its deadly champion and avenger.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自然之牙是对那些破坏自然、猎杀动物，或是传播疾病的人最残忍的德鲁伊。她为了更强大的复仇力量，甚至放弃了一部分与自然的链接。此变体来自Mod: TableTopTweaks，译者：1onepower。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, a nature fang gains the slayer’s studied target class feature. At 5th level and every 5 levels thereafter, the nature fang’s bonus against her studied target increases by 1.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在1级时，自然之牙获得研究目标的能力，将德鲁伊等级视为杀手等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 7th level, a character can study an opponent as a move or swift action.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 7级时，自然之牙可以以迅捷动作研究目标。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are innately in tune with nature and venerate the power and mystery of the natural world.
You get a +2 bonus on all Lore (Nature) checks and Perception checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你在学识(自然)和察觉上获得+2加值，如果这两项技能都至少有10级，改为+4。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can choose to wield your weapon in one hand instead of two if possible.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 如果你仅持用一把非轻型的单手武器，默认效果是你双手握持它。在加载TableTopTweaks后，许多需要你空出一只手的能力*真的*需要你空出一只手。激活此能力以强制单手握持你的武器，你会因此只能将1倍调整值应用在伤害上而不是1.5倍。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You must declare that you are using this feat before you make your attack roll (thus a failed attack roll ruins the attempt). You can roll your attack roll twice and take the higher result. You may attempt a perfect attack once per day for every four levels you have attained (but see Special).
Special: A zen archer monk receives Perfect Strike as a bonus feat at 1st level, even if he does not meet the prerequisites. A monk may attempt an perfect strike attack a number of times per day equal to his monk level, plus one more time per day for every four levels he has in classes other than monk.
At 10th level, the monk can roll his attack roll three times and take the highest result.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以重投一次失手的攻击检定，你需要在攻击前声明使用此能力。你每日的可用次数等同武僧等级，外加每四个非武僧的等级一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 10th level, the zen archer can roll his attack roll three times and take the highest result when making a perfect strike.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 10级时，你使用完美打击时可以骰3次并取最高的结果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Whenever you score a critical hit, double any extra precision damage dice, such as sneak attack damage. These dice are only doubled, not multiplied by the weapon’s critical modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每当你确认一次重击，将所有精准伤害的伤害骰乘二，不随武器重击倍率增加。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level and every 4 levels thereafter, a primalist can choose to take either his bloodline power or two barbarian rage powers. If the primalist chooses rage powers, those rage powers can be used in conjunction with his bloodrage, and his bloodrager level acts as his barbarian level when determining the effect of those bloodrage powers and any prerequisites. Any other prerequisites for a rage power must be met before a primalist can choose it. This ability does not count as the rage power class feature for determining feat prerequisites and other requirements.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在4级和之后的每4级，原怒者可以选择放弃一项血脉能力，换取任选的两项狂暴特技，你需要满足这些特技的先决条件。你可以在使用原怒者狂暴并应用这些特技时将原怒者等级视作野蛮人等级来计算特技的效果，但在其他任何时候，原怒者等级不视作野蛮人等级，也不视作可狂暴职业的等级，例如在选择某些专长时。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You may channel energy as a move action by spending 2 daily uses of that ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以消耗两次导能次数，以移动动作引导能量。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can draw a weapon as a free action instead of as a move action.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以以自由动作切换或拔出武器。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You have graduated from one of the many colleges, universities, and specialized schools of higher learning scattered throughout the Inner Sea region.
You get a +2 bonus on Knowledge (Arcana) and Knowledge (World) skill checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你在知识(神秘)和知识(世界)上获得+2加值，如果这两项技能都至少有10级，改为+4。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You know how to get along in the wild and how to effectively treat wounds.
You get a +2 bonus on Lore (Nature) and Lore (Religion) skill checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你在学识(自然)和学识(宗教)上获得+2加值，如果这两项技能都至少有10级，改为+4。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You use material from the Shadow Plane to cast a quasi-real, illusory version of a psychic, sorcerer, or wizard enchantment spell of 2nd level or lower. Spells that deal damage or have other effects work as normal unless the affected creature succeeds at a Will save. If the disbelieved enchantment spell has a damaging effect, that effect is one-fifth as strong (if applicable) or only 20% likely to occur.
If recognized as a shadow enchantment, a damaging spell deals only one - fifth(20 %) the normal amount of damage.
If the disbelieved attack has a special effect other than damage, that effect is one-fifth as strong (if applicable) or only 20% likely to occur. Regardless of the result of the save to disbelieve, an affected creature is also allowed any save (or spell resistance) that the spell being simulated allows, but the save DC is set according to shadow enchantment’s level (3rd) rather than the spell’s normal level. Objects, mindless creatures, and creatures immune to mind-affecting effects automatically succeed at their Will saves against this spell.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你使用阴影位面的能量施展一个半真半假的惑控系法术，它来自法师法术表不高于2环。法术如常造成伤害或其他效果，除非目标通过意志豁免检定。成功的意志豁免会使得法术只能造成20%的原有伤害，或只有20%的可能性产生原本的效果(具体是哪一种削弱取决于惑控法术本身的性质)。免疫心智效果的生物无需进行鉴定自动成功。若意志豁免失败，对方须正常承受该惑控法术，但仍可以对该法术进行法术抗力检定和豁免检定(如惑控法术本身允许魔抗和/或豁免)。法术DC和法术穿透调整值使用的是阴影惑控的数值，而非该惑控法术(比如，享受幻术DC增益，不享受惑控学派DC增益)。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This spell functions like shadow enchantment, except that it enables you to create partially real, illusory versions of psychic, sorcerer, or wizard enchantment spells of 5th level or lower. If the spell is recognized as a greater shadow enchantment, it’s only three-fifths (60%) as effective.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 此法术效果近乎于阴影惑控，但可以使用不高于5环的惑控法术。此外即使生物通过意志豁免不相信此幻术，法术能造成60%的原有伤害，或有60%的可能性产生原本的效果(具体是哪一种削弱取决于惑控法术本身的性质)。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An opponent you affect with Shatter Defenses is flat-footed to your attacks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 受到你的粉碎防御影响的敌人对你的攻击视为措手不及。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An opponent you affect with Shatter Defenses is flat-footed to your attacks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 受到你的粉碎防御影响的敌人对你的攻击视为措手不及。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An opponent affected by Shatter Defenses is flat-footed to all attacks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 受到你的粉碎防御影响的敌人对所有攻击视为措手不及。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An opponent you affect with Shatter Defenses is flat-footed to all attacks, not just yours.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 受到你的粉碎防御影响的敌人对所有攻击视为措手不及。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Many of those who dwell among the rooftops become skillful at making bounding leaps and clambering up steep surfaces, and learn how to land more safely when they fall.
You get a +2 bonus on Athletics and Mobility skill checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你在运动和灵巧上获得+2加值，如果这两项技能都至少有10级，改为+4。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Starting at 1st level, you can fire an acidic ray as a standard action, targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged touch attack. The acidic ray deals 1d6 points of acid damage + 1 for every two sorcerer levels you possess. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1级起，你可以用标准动作发射酸性射线进行远程接触攻击。造成1d6伤害，每两个术士职业等级提高1d6。每日使用次数为3+魅力调整值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Starting at 1st level, you can fire an acidic ray as a standard action, targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged touch attack. The acidic ray deals 1d6 points of acid damage + 1 for every two sorcerer levels you possess. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1级起，你可以用标准动作发射酸性射线进行远程接触攻击。造成1d6伤害，每两个术士职业等级提高1d6。每日使用次数为3+魅力调整值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 15th level, you gain spell resistance equal to your sorcerer level + 10.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 15级起你获得等同术士等级+10的法术抗力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
There is a taint in your blood, one that is alien and bizarre. You tend to think in odd ways, approaching problems from an angle that most would not expect. Over time, this taint manifests itself in your physical form.
Bonus Feats of the Aberrant Bloodline:: Combat Casting, Improved Disarm, Improved Dirty Trick, Improved Initiative, Improved Unarmed Strike, Iron Will, Extend Spell, Skill Focus (Knowledge (World)).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
在你的血统中，有一个外来和怪异的污点。你趋向于使用奇怪的方式思考，从大多数人所不希望的角度接近问题。随着时间的推移，这个污点在你的外形上得以显现。
额外专长可选列表：战斗施法、精通缴械、精通阴招、精通先攻、精通徒手打击、钢铁意志、法术延时、技能专攻。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Whenever you cast a spell of the polymorph subschool, increase the duration of the spell by 50% (minimum 1 round). This bonus does not stack with the increase granted by the Extend Spell feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 任何时候你的变化学派法术视为应用了法术延时超魔，但不能再应用一次延时超魔。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Additional class skill from the aberrant bloodline.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 来自血承的额外本职技能

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 7th level, and every six levels thereafter, a sorcerer receives one bonus feat, chosen from a list specific to each bloodline. The sorcerer must meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats.
Bonus Feats: Combat Casting, Improved Disarm, Improved Dirty Trick, Improved Initiative, Improved Unarmed Strike, Iron Will, Extend Spell, Skill Focus (Knowledge (World)).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 7级和之后的每6级，术士从血承专长列表中选择一项专长，需要满足先决条件。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 20th level, your body becomes truly unnatural. You are immune to critical hits and sneak attacks. +In addition, you gain blindsight with a range of 60 feet and damage reduction 5/—

At 3rd level, your reach increases by 5 feet whenever you are making a melee touch attack. This ability does not otherwise increase your threatened area. At 11th level, this bonus to your reach increases to 10 feet. At 17th level, this bonus to your reach increases to 15 feet.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级起你的所有近战攻击触及范围增大5尺。11级时增大10尺，17级时增大15尺。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, and every two levels thereafter, a sorcerer learns an additional spell, derived from her bloodline.
Feeblemind: The target creature's Intelligence and Charisma scores each drop to 1. The affected creature is unable to use Intelligence- or Charisma-based skills or cast spells. Still, it knows who its friends are and can follow them and even protect them. The subject remains in this state until a heal or break enchantment spell is used to cancel the effect of the feeblemind. A creature that can cast arcane spells, such as a sorcerer or a wizard, takes a –4 penalty on its saving throw.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级和之后的每2级，术士从血承中学习一个额外法术：弱智术

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, and every two levels thereafter, a sorcerer learns an additional spell, derived from her bloodline.
Eyebite: Each round, you can target a single living creature, striking it with waves of power. Depending on the target's HD, this attack has as many as three effects:
If the target's HD is 10 or more, it is sickened for 10 minutes per caster level.
If the target's HD is 5–9, it is frightened and sickened for 10 minutes per caster level.
If the target's HD is 4 or less, it is paralyzed, frightened, and sickened
The effects are cumulative and concurrent for 10 minutes per caster level.
You must spend a swift action each round after the first to target a foe.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级和之后的每2级，术士从血承中学习一个额外法术：摄心目光

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, and every two levels thereafter, a sorcerer learns an additional spell, derived from her bloodline.
Polymorph, Greater: This spell transforms an allied creature into a large smilodon, shambling mound, elemental, wyvern or medium dragon-like creature. The subject may choose to resume its normal form as a full-round action; doing so ends the spell for that subject.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级和之后的每2级，术士从血承中学习一个额外法术：高等变形术

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, and every two levels thereafter, a sorcerer learns an additional spell, derived from her bloodline.
Mind Blank: This spell grants a +8 resistance bonus on saving throws against all mind-affecting spells and effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级和之后的每2级，术士从血承中学习一个额外法术：心灵屏障

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, and every two levels thereafter, a sorcerer learns an additional spell, derived from her bloodline.
Shapechange: This spell allows you to take the form of a wide variety of creatures. This spell can function as beast shape IV, elemental body IV and dragonkind III depending on what form you take. You can change form once each round as a free action. The change takes place either immediately before your regular action or immediately after it, but not during the action.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级和之后的每2级，术士从血承中学习一个额外法术：变化形体

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, and every two levels thereafter, a sorcerer learns an additional spell, derived from her bloodline.
Enlarge Person: This spell causes instant growth of a humanoid creature, doubling its height and multiplying its weight by 8. This increase changes the creature's size category to the next larger one. The target gains a +2 size bonus to Strength, a –2 size penalty to Dexterity (to a minimum of 1), and a –1 penalty on attack rolls and AC due to its increased size. Melee and ranged weapons used by this creature deal more damage.
A humanoid creature whose size increases to Large has a space of 10 feet and a natural reach of 10 feet. This spell does not change the target's speed.
Enlarge person dispels reduce person.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级和之后的每2级，术士从血承中学习一个额外法术：变巨术

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, and every two levels thereafter, a sorcerer learns an additional spell, derived from her bloodline.
See Invisibility: You can see any objects or beings that are invisible within your range of vision.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级和之后的每2级，术士从血承中学习一个额外法术：识破隐形

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, and every two levels thereafter, a sorcerer learns an additional spell, derived from her bloodline.
Blink: Physical attacks against you have a 50% miss chance and the Blind Fight feat doesn't help opponents, since you're ethereal and not merely invisible. If the attack is capable of striking ethereal creatures, the miss chance is only 20% (for concealment). Any individually targeted spell has a 50% chance to fail against you while you're blinking unless your attacker can target invisible, ethereal creatures.
If the attacker can see invisible creatures, the miss chance is also only 20%. For an attacker who can both see and strike ethereal creatures, there is no miss chance.
Likewise, your own attacks have a 20% miss chance. While blinking, you take only half damage from area attacks (but full damage from those that extend onto the Ethereal Plane). Although you are only partially visible, you are not considered invisible and targets retain their Dexterity bonus to AC against your attacks. You do receive a +2 bonus on attack rolls made against enemies that cannot see invisible creatures.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级和之后的每2级，术士从血承中学习一个额外法术：闪现术

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, and every two levels thereafter, a sorcerer learns an additional spell, derived from her bloodline.
Spike Stones: Rocky ground, stone floors, and similar surfaces shape themselves into long, sharp points that blend into the background.
Spike stones impede progress through an area and deal damage. Any creature moving on foot into or through the spell's area moves at half speed. In addition, each creature moving through the area takes 1d8 points of piercing damage for each 5 feet of movement through the spiked area.
Any creature that takes damage from this spell must also succeed at a Reflex save to avoid injuries to its feet and legs. A failed save causes the creature's speed to be reduced to half normal for 1 minute.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级和之后的每2级，术士从血承中学习一个额外法术：岩突

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 9th level, your anatomy changes, giving you a 25% chance to ignore any critical hit or sneak attack scored against you. This chance increases to 50% at 13th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 9级起，你的身体构造开始变换移动，使敌人难以命中你的要害，你获得25%护命。13级时改为50%护命。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your family is destined for greatness in some way. Your birth could have been foretold in prophecy, or perhaps it occurred during an especially auspicious event, such as a solar eclipse. Regardless of your bloodline’s origin, you have a great future ahead.
Bonus Feats of the Destined Bloodline: Arcane Strike, Diehard, Endurance, Sieze The Moment, Lightning Reflexes, Maximize Spell, Skill Focus (Knowledge World), Weapon Focus.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的家族注定以某种方式成就伟业。你的出生可能为预言提及，或者也许你出生在一次拥有特殊前兆的事件当中。比如一次日蚀。无论你的血统来源，你都拥有伟大的未来。
血承专长列表：奥术打击，顽强，坚忍，抓准时机，闪电反射，法术极效，技能专攻(知识：世界)，武器专攻。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Whenever you cast a spell with a range of “personal,” you gain a luck bonus equal to the spell’s level on all your saving throws for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每当你施放一个只能选择自身为目标的法术后，1轮内你的所有豁免获得等同该法术环级的幸运加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Additional class skill from the destined bloodline.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 来自命运血承的额外本职技能

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 20th level, your moment of destiny is at hand. Any critical threats made against you only confirm if the second roll results in a natural 20 on the die. Any critical threats you score with a spell are automatically confirmed. Once per day, you can automatically succeed at one caster level check made to overcome spell resistance. You must use this ability before making the roll.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在20级，你命运的时刻就在眼前。任何你的法术重击威胁确认自动成功，任何针对你的重击威胁只有投出20才能确认。每天1次，你在对抗法术抗力的施法者等级检定中直接投出20。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day, you can automatically succeed at one caster level check made to overcome spell resistance. You must use this ability before making the roll.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你在穿透法术抗力的检定上总是投出20。你每日可以使用1次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You automatically succeed at one caster level check made to overcome spell resistance.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你在穿透法术抗力的检定上总是投出20。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Starting at 3rd level, you gain a +1 luck bonus on all of your saving throws and to your AC during the firstround of combat or when you are otherwise unaware of an attack. At 7th level and every four levels thereafter, this bonus increases by +1, to a maximum of +5 at 19th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级开始，你在每次战斗突袭轮和第一轮，所有豁免和AC获得+1幸运加值。在7级以及之后每4级，此加值再+1。19级时达到最大值+5。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Starting at 3rd level, you gain a +1 luck bonus on all of your saving throws and to your AC during the firstround of combat. At 7th level and every four levels thereafter, this bonus increases by +1, to a maximum of +5 at 19th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级开始，你在每次战斗突袭轮和第一轮，所有豁免和AC获得+1幸运加值。在7级以及之后每4级，此加值再+1。19级时达到最大值+5。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 7th level, and every six levels thereafter, a sorcerer receives one bonus feat, chosen from a list specific to each bloodline. The sorcerer must meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats.
Bonus Feats: Arcane Strike, Diehard, Endurance, Sieze The Moment, Lightning Reflexes, Maximize Spell, Skill Focus (Knowledge World), Weapon Focus.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 7级和之后的每6级，术士从血承专长列表中选择一项专长，需要满足先决条件。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 9th level, you may reroll any one attack roll, critical hit confirmation roll, or level check made to overcome spell resistance. At 9th level, you can use this ability once per day. At 17th level, you can use this ability twice per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 9级开始，你能够重投一次攻击检定，重击确认判定，或者对抗法术抗性的施法者等级检定。17级时，你可以每日使用两次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 9th level, you may reroll any one attack roll, critical hit confirmation roll, or level check made to overcome spell resistance. At 17th level, you can use this ability twice per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 9级开始，你能够重投一次攻击检定，重击确认判定，或者对抗法术抗性的施法者等级检定。17级时，你可以每日使用两次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You may reroll any one attack roll, critical hit confirmation roll, or level check made to overcome spell resistance.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你能够重投一次攻击检定，重击确认判定，或者对抗法术抗性的施法者等级检定。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: It Was Meant To Be (+1 Uses)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 命中注定：额外使用次数

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, and every two levels thereafter, a sorcerer learns an additional spell, derived from her bloodline.
Break Enchantment: This spell frees victims from enchantments, transmutations, and curses. Break enchantment can reverse even an instantaneous effect. For each such effect, you make a caster level check (1d20 + caster level, maximum +15) against a DC of 11 + caster level of the effect. Success means that the creature is free of the spell, curse, or effect. Break enchantment only works on spells of 5th level or lower.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级和之后的每2级，术士从血承中学习一个额外法术

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, and every two levels thereafter, a sorcerer learns an additional spell, derived from her bloodline.
Heroism, Greater: This spell functions like heroism, except the creature gains a +4 morale bonus on attack rolls, saves, and skill checks, immunity to fear effects, and temporary hit points equal to your caster level (maximum 20).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级和之后的每2级，术士从血承中学习一个额外法术

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, and every two levels thereafter, a sorcerer learns an additional spell, derived from her bloodline.
Circle of Clarity: You create a magical emanation that interferes with all illusions within it, giving creatures a +4 bonus on saving throws to recognize them as illusions. The emanation negates concealment less than total concealment within the area. Perception checks to notice creatures or objects within the area gain a bonus equal to half your caster level (maximum +10). The spell is stationary if cast on a point in space. It is mobile if centered on a creature or object, though creatures or attended objects can negate the spell with the proper saving throw or spell resistance.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级和之后的每2级，术士从血承中学习一个额外法术

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, and every two levels thereafter, a sorcerer learns an additional spell, derived from her bloodline.
Protection from Spells: The subject gains a +8 resistance bonus on saving throws against spells and spell-like abilities (but not against supernatural and extraordinary abilities).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级和之后的每2级，术士从血承中学习一个额外法术

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, and every two levels thereafter, a sorcerer learns an additional spell, derived from her bloodline.
Foresight: This spell grants you a powerful sixth sense. Once foresight is cast, you receive instantaneous warnings of impending danger or harm to the subject of the spell. You are never flat-footed. In addition, the spell gives you a general idea of what action you might take to best protect yourself and gives you a +2 insight bonus to AC and on Reflex saves.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级和之后的每2级，术士从血承中学习一个额外法术

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, and every two levels thereafter, a sorcerer learns an additional spell, derived from her bloodline.
Shield: Shield creates an invisible shield of force that hovers in front of you. It negates magic missile attacks directed at you. The disk also provides a +4 shield bonus to AC. This bonus applies against incorporeal touch attacks, since it is a force effect. The shield has no armor check penalty or arcane spell failure chance.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级和之后的每2级，术士从血承中学习一个额外法术

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, and every two levels thereafter, a sorcerer learns an additional spell, derived from her bloodline.
Blur: The subject's outline appears blurred, shifting, and wavering. This distortion grants the subject concealment (20% miss chance).
A see invisibility spell does not counteract the blur effect, but a true seeing spell does.
Opponents that cannot see the subject ignore the spell's effect (though fighting an unseen opponent carries penalties of its own).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级和之后的每2级，术士从血承中学习一个额外法术

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, and every two levels thereafter, a sorcerer learns an additional spell, derived from her bloodline.
Protection From Energy: Protection from energy grants temporary immunity to the type of energy you specify when you cast it (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic). When the spell absorbs 12 points per caster level of energy damage (to a maximum of 120 points at 10th level), it is discharged.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级和之后的每2级，术士从血承中学习一个额外法术

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, and every two levels thereafter, a sorcerer learns an additional spell, derived from her bloodline.
Freedom of Movement: This spell enables you or a creature you touch to move and attack normally for the duration of the spell, even under the influence of magic that usually impedes movement, such as paralysis, solid fog, slow, and web. All combat maneuver checks made to grapple the target automatically fail.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级和之后的每2级，术士从血承中学习一个额外法术

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, you can touch a creature as a standard action, giving it an insight bonus on attack rolls, skill checks, ability checks, and saving throws equal to 1/2 your sorcerer level (minimum 1) for 1 round. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1级开始，你能够用标准动作碰触一个生物，使它在攻击、技能、属性、豁免检定时获得等同于术士等级一半的洞察加值，持续1轮。你能够每天使用此能力次数为3+魅力修正。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 15th level, your ultimate destiny is drawing near. Once per day, when an attack or spell that causes damage would result in your death, you may attempt a DC 20 Will save. If successful, you are instead reduced to –1 hit points and are automatically stabilized. The bonus from your fated ability applies to this save.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在15级时，你的最终命运近在咫尺。每天1次，当一次攻击或者法术将你伤害致死时，你能够通过一次DC20的意志豁免。如果成功，你的生命值只减少到-1并且伤势自动稳定。你的「宿命」能力提供的加值在此次豁免中同样生效。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: When a magus selects this arcana, he must select one spell from the wizard spell list that is of a magus spell level he can cast. He adds this spell to his spellbook and list of magus spells known as a magus spell of its wizard spell level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 选择一个法师表的法术，添加到魔战士法术表的同环级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: When a magus selects this arcana, he must select two spells from the wizard spell list that are one level lower of a magus spell level he can cast. He adds these spells to his spellbook and list of magus spells known as magus spells of thier wizard spell level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 选择两个法师表的法术，添加到魔战士法术表的同环级，这些法术需要低于你已掌握的最高环级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
When a magus selects this arcana, he must select one spell from the wizard spell list that is of a magus spell level he can cast. He adds this spell to his spellbook and list of magus spells known as a magus spell of its wizard spell level. He can instead select two spells to add in this way, but both must be at least one level lower than the highest-level magus spell he can cast.
A magus can select this magus arcana more than once.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 选择法师表的法术，添加到魔战士法术表的同环级。你可以选择一个法术，或者两个低于你已掌握的最高环级的法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: By sacrificing a prepared spell of the same or higher level than your specialized spell, you may spontaneously cast your specialized spell. The specialized spell is treated as its normal level, regardless of the spell slot used to cast it. You may add a metamagic feat to the spell by increasing the spell slot and casting time, just like a cleric spontaneously casting a cure or inflict spell with a metamagic feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 任何时候，你可以牺牲一个同环或更高环的法术位来自发施放你专精的法术，此法术仍然视作原环级，即使你用更高环的法术位来施展。你可以对此法术应用超魔专长，但需要的法术位最低等级也会相应提高，且需要整轮来施法。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: While fighting defensively or using Combat Expertise, you can forgo the dodge bonus to AC you would normally gain to instead gain an equivalent amount of DR, to a maximum of DR 5/—, until the start of your next turn.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当你使用防御式攻击或寓守于攻时，你可以失去其AC加值，代之以获得等量的Dr/-。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: While fighting defensively or using Combat Expertise, you can forgo the dodge bonus to AC you would normally gain to instead gain an equivalent amount of DR, to a maximum of DR 5/—, until the start of your next turn. This damage reduction stacks with DR you gain from class features, such as the barbarian’s, but not with DR from any other source.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当你使用防御式攻击或寓守于攻时，你可以失去其AC加值，代之以获得等量的Dr/-。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Double the DR you gain from Stalwart, to a maximum of DR 10/—.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你从坚毅获得的Dr翻倍，但以10/-封顶。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Weapon uses armor enchants and material.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 武器使用你的盔甲的增强和材质

LocalizedStrings.enGB: While wearing medium or heavy armor, a fighter can deliver a headbutt with his helm as part of a full attack action. This headbutt is in addition to his normal attacks, and is made using the fighter’s base attack bonus – 5. A helmet headbutt deals 1d3 points of damage if the fighter is wearing medium armor, or 1d4 points of damage if he is wearing heavy armor (1d2 and 1d3, respectively, for Small creatures), plus an amount of damage equal to 1/2 the fighter’s Strength modifier. Treat this attack as a weapon attack made using the same special material and enchantment bonus (if any) as the armor.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当战士穿着中甲或者重甲时，他在全轮攻击中加上一记头槌。这个头槌使用战士的最高BAB-5。头槌将会在战士穿着中甲时造成1d3点伤害，或者在他穿着重甲时造成1d4点伤害(对于小体型战士则分别是1d2和1d3)，再加上等同于战士1/2力量调整值的伤害。这次攻击视为武器攻击，并使用和他盔甲一样的特殊材料(如果有的话)。盔甲的增强加值不会调整头槌的伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are able to navigate the streets and personalities of whatever locale you run across.
You get a +2 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception skill checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你在知识(世界)和察觉上获得+2加值，如果这两项技能都至少有10级，改为+4。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, when a sword saint confirms a critical hit, he can spend 2 points from his arcane pool to increase his weapon's critical multiplier by 1.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 4级时，每当剑圣确认重击，他可以消耗两点奥能点，使武器的重击倍率提升1。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Creature gains spell resistance equal to its level +5. It also gains:
1 — 4 HD: resistance 5 to cold, acid, and electricity.
5 — 10 HD: resistance 10 to cold, acid, and electricity, DR 5/evil
11+ HD: resistance 15 to cold, acid, and electricity, DR 10/evil
Smite Evil (Su): Once per day, the celestial creature may smite a evil-aligned creature. As a swift action, the creature chooses one target within sight to smite. If this target is evil, the creature adds its Charisma bonus (if any) to attack rolls and gains a damage bonus equal to its HD against that foe. This effect persists until the target is dead or the creature rests.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
动物伙伴获得等同其等级+5的法术抗力，此外：
1级: 5点寒、酸、电抗
5级: 10点寒、酸、电抗, DR 5/邪恶
11级: 15点寒、酸、电抗, DR 10/邪恶
辟邪斩: 每日一次，此天界生物可以制裁邪恶生物，以一个迅捷动作，选择视野范围内的一个邪恶生物，获得等同此动物伙伴魅力加值(如为加值)的攻击加值，和等同此动物伙伴等级的伤害加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Attacks with this weapon get +1 enhancement bonus on both attack and damage rolls.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 使用此武器的攻击和伤害检定获得+1加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Attacks with this weapon get +2 enhancement bonus on both attack and damage rolls.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 使用此武器的攻击和伤害检定获得+2加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Attacks with this weapon get +3 enhancement bonus on both attack and damage rolls.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 使用此武器的攻击和伤害检定获得+3加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Attacks with this weapon get +4 enhancement bonus on both attack and damage rolls.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 使用此武器的攻击和伤害检定获得+4加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Attacks with this weapon get +5 enhancement bonus on both attack and damage rolls.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 使用此武器的攻击和伤害检定获得+5加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Attacks with this weapon get +6 enhancement bonus on both attack and damage rolls.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 使用此武器的攻击和伤害检定获得+6加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Whenever the wielder of this weapon lands a killing blow, he deals sonic damage equal to his ranks in the Athletics skill to all enemies within 10 feet. Successful Reflex save (DC 30) halves the damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每当此武器的持用者杀死生物，对周围10尺所有生物造成等同他的运动等级的伤害，DC30的反射豁免减半此伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Whenever the wielder of this +5 ultrasound earthbreaker lands a killing blow, he deals sonic damage equal to his ranks in the Athletics skill to all enemies within 10 feet. Successful Reflex save (DC 30) halves the damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每当这把+5裂地锤的持用者杀死生物，对周围10尺所有生物造成等同他的运动等级的伤害，DC30的反射豁免减半此伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: When the fighter uses Weapon Finesse to make a melee attack with a weapon, using his Dexterity modifier on attack rolls and his Strength modifier on damage rolls, he doubles his weapon training bonus on damage rolls. The fighter must have Weapon Finesse in order to choose this option.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当战士使用已训练的武器娴熟可选武器，以敏捷作为攻击调整值且以力量作为伤害调整值时，你将武器训练对攻击和伤害的增值都翻倍。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: When the fighter makes a ranged attack with a thrown weapon and applies his Dexterity modifier on attack rolls and his Strength modifier on damage rolls, he doubles his weapon training bonus on damage rolls.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 任何时候，如果你使用投掷类武器时以敏捷作为攻击调整值且力量作为伤害调整值，你的武器训练在攻击加值和伤害加值上的效果都翻倍。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A rogue adds 1/2 her level on Perception checks and Trickery checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 游荡者将职业等级的一半加在察觉和巧手上。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can make a check using Mounted Combat to negate a hit on your mount twice per round instead of just once.
Attacks are made with a 1.5 damage multipler.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 造成的伤害应用1.5倍属性调整值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can ride creatures equal to your own size category instead of only creatures larger than you.

The fighter can forge a spiritual bond with a weapon that belongs to the associated weapon group, allowing him to unlock the weapon’s potential. Each day he gains a number of points of spiritual energy equal to 1 + his maximum weapon training bonus. While wielding a weapon he has weapon training with, he can spend 1 point of spiritual energy to grant the weapon an enhancement bonus equal to his weapon training bonus. Enhancement bonuses gained by this advanced weapon training option stack with those of the weapon, to a maximum of +5. The fighter can also imbue the weapon with any one weapon special ability with an equivalent enhancement bonus less than or equal to his maximum bonus by reducing the granted enhancement bonus by the amount of the equivalent enhancement bonus. These bonuses last for 1 minute.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 战士每天获得等同于1+他的武器训练加值的精神能量。当装备训练的武器时，他可以消耗1点精神能量来使武器额外获得等同于他武器训练加值的增强加值，这个增强加值与武器自身的增强加值叠加但最高+5。战士也可以不直接给予武器增强加值而是给予武器特殊属性，用特殊属性等效增强加值替换你本应给予的增强加值同额数值。该能力的增强加值持续1分钟。
